name: ReRoad (itch)
description:
You can play 'DEMO' NOW!
ReRoad is a tower defense game in which players dig their own road and design enemy paths. When you make your way, your colleague 'Jane' sends  decoy to attract enemies. The range, the attack methods, are all different for the different towers. We need to design the roads and use the towers efficiently.
Each tower has a special dedicated parts and  various upgrade effects for each tower.Upgrade your dedicated parts to make the tower more powerful. 
Among the random effects, you have to upgrade your parts by selecting them according to the situation, such as the roads and tower you've built, and the enemies you're coming to.
